titles.title: To designate the community center at McConnell Air Force Base, Kansas, as the "Robert J. Dole Community Center" in honor of World War II veteran and former United States Representative and Senator Robert J. Dole.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 1/28/2004--Introduced. Designates the community center at McConnell Air Force Base, Kansas, known as Emerald City, as the Robert J. Dole Community Center in honor of World War II veteran and former United States Representative and Senator Robert J. Dole.
